name: Steel Gas Stove
desc: Durable single-burner steel gas stove for everyday cooking. Stable support, easy ignition and low gas consumption.

name: CADAC Gas Stove with Pipe
desc: Compact CADAC stove including a connection pipe. Reliable flame control and great for indoor or outdoor use.

name: Afrox Gas Stove
desc: Budget-friendly Afrox burner offering consistent heat output and sturdy construction for daily cooking.

name: 9kg Gas Tank (Empty)
desc: Standard 9kg empty LPG cylinder. Inspect valve and O-ring regularly; refill at certified points.

name: 11kg Gas Tank (Empty)
desc: Large 11kg empty LPG cylinder for extended use. Store upright in a cool, ventilated area.
